name: Raining Cats & Dogs (Skuzzle_UK)
description:
Raining Cats & Dogs

GameOff Submission

Cliché used : It's raining cats and dogs.

Play as the wicked princess who throws cats and dogs off of the roof so that they rain down on the pedestrians below.

Created for Game Off 2022
Link to the GitHub Repo

A / D - Move Left / Right
Space - Fire Primary Weapon
Enter - Fire Secondary Weapon
(Controls can be changed in options screen, including mouse buttons)

Hit as many targets as possible to get the highest score before the time runs out.

Hit a rat for an extra secondary weapon.

Hit a paper plane for an extra 20 seconds.

I created the gameplay mechanics while my 8 year old daughter put together the graphics for this simple and addictive little game. Music by my wife.
